org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.as3.NativeReferenceCreator

type
class
extends
org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.base.NativeReferenceCreatorBase
This is the flash AVM2 implementation of the native reference creator. It instantiate a native flash display object and returns it as a NativeReference

Constructor

new()
class constructor

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

createNativeReference(nativeReferenceType : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReferenceTypeValue) : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReference

overrides org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.base.NativeReferenceCreatorBase
parameters
nativeReferenceType the type of element to create (graphic, text...)
Instantiate a native flash display object based on the requested type and returns a reference to it.
